Then a <S%H7991>lord<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8172>leaned<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> if the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> would <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H699>windows<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> might <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H1961>be?<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> thou shalt <S%H7200>see<s%> it with thine <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> but shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4480>thereof.<s%> <S%H8033><s%>

And they rose <S%H6965>up<s%> in the <S%H5399>twilight,<s%> to <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians:<s%> and when they were <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> the uttermost <S%H7097>part<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H758>Syria,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

For the <S%H136>Lord<s%> had <S%H853>made<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> a <S%H6963>noise<s%> of <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and a <S%H6963>noise<s%> of <S%H5483>horses,<s%> even the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2428>host:<s%> and they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H251>another,<s%> <S%H2009>Lo,<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> hath <S%H7936>hired<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H853>us<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> us.
